name: Agent 001 (Maytch)
description:
Agent 001, you're our only hope. Literally our only hope, because someone spent our entire budget on that gun we've sent you. We can't even afford any other Agents.

With that gun you can customize it with parts harvested from your enemies. Use it to harvest data, hack terminals, open gates, take down robots, or just shoot people with it. You don't even need to press the trigger!

Within your gun contains a circuit that runs from the ‘P’ Power Resource. Make sure to correctly attach your Harvest and Shoot Resources to the circuit so that the gun can power them.

Grab whatever you can from this base. Harvest their data and empty their pockets Agent 001, we need the money.

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • F to Toggle Weapon Edit Mode
  • Left click to select Resource in Weapon Edit Mode
  • Right click to rotate Resource in Weapon Edit Mode

Unity Dev, Art + Music by Maytch.

Music is a cover of You Know My Name - Chris Cornell

Gun sounds from Ancient_Game_16bit Audio Pack
